directions: Have ready a bowl of ice and cold water. Cook peas in a large saucepan of boiling salted water until bright green and crisp-tender, about 2 minutes. Drain and immediately transfer to ice water. When cold, drain well and pat dry.

Mash walnuts to a paste with a mortar and pestle and whisk in broth, oil, lemon juice, cayenne, and dill until blended. Season with salt and pepper. Toss walnut mixture with peas and cucumber until vegetables are coated.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fat-free chicken broth or water
1 English cucumber, halved lengthwise and cut crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices
title: Sugar Snap Pea and Cucumber Salad
